summary: Eye-tracking web app with BLE connectivity support, deployed on Internet Computer. Currently on Version 38 with eye blink/open detection features and BLE integration using Nordic UART Service UUID.
architectural_notes: BLE connection uses acceptAllDevices: true with optionalServices including UUID 6e400001-b5a3-f393-e0a9-e50e24dcca9e (Nordic UART Service)

existing_features.title: In the Bluetooth connection request (within BluetoothContext.tsx and/or useEyeRBluetooth.ts), update the navigator.bluetooth.requestDevice() call to use 'acceptAllDevices: true' instead of any device filters, and add the device's NUS service UUID '6e400001-b5a3-f393-e0a9-e50e24dcca9e' to the 'optionalServices' array so the browser grants access to that GATT service after pairing.

projectName: Fix BLE device discovery: enable acceptAllDevices and add optionalServices UUID
